section.p: You are crawling in the grass near the general’s tent when you trigger a magical trap. A circle of black dust has been spread around the tent - as soon as your skin comes into contact with the dust, it begins to glow with a bright yellow light. You are instantly spotted by the guards and captured.
The punishment for spies and assassins is swift and immediate - death by hanging or ‘kicking Nagil’s jig’ as the expression goes. .
